text:
hello,
Can't i write scss rather than css on HubSpot?

The Design Manager/Design Tools does not support SCSS. You can use the <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> tools to integrate scss and javascript bundlers/compilers.

<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development>

For a lot of SCSS functionality there is actually a way to do it with HubL.

There’s also the concept of how HubSpot modules work, if css is tied to a module it’s better for it to be in the module itself. Enabling HubSpot to do the minification and combination for you.

hi jon,
Thankyou have added it locally . here are some fields i can see on json , is there docs for this what this key value are for?

yes, so it looks like you’ve downloaded  a drag n drop template. Those templates are stored in this JSON format. It’s easiest to edit drag n drop templates via the design manager, but being able to download and sync the JSON allows you to enter these files into version control
